name: UKDropshipGroup.com Reviews
overview:
UKDropshipGroup.com Review

UKDropshipgroup have been offering dropshipping website solutions, together with our group of companies for over 6 years.

We are the largest group of dropshipping companies available in the UK today..

UKDropshipGroup.com, and our group of companies were one of the very first companies in the UK to offer dropshipping website solutions. In fact, we were the FIRST company in the world to offer feed-stock-populated websites way back in 2004, when dropshipping as a business model was starting to become popular in the United Kingdom.

The uniqueness of what we provide, together with our product reviews, and experiences of the dropship industry, is that we know what works. We are also professional internet marketers, and can truly relate to what our customers need to do, in order to get their new website businesses off the ground.

To date, we have placed over 30,000+ customers in the position of owning their own, online business. Which we would say is the largest compilation of dropship membership activity of itâ€™s kind in the world.

We specialise in providing low cost, easily affordable website solutions, which can be up and running (automatically) inside 30 minutes, populated with products, ready to start selling, and promoting â€“ even if it is 3am in the morning.

Again, this is a breakthrough in the dropshipping, and website population industry, as no other company can automate what we offer, which is of massive convenience to clients looking to start their own website â€“ on a budget â€“ but with the full armoury of tools to take the business to market.

Not only that, but the software we offer (the actual website) has been specifically designed with dropshipping in mind â€“ from ordering, to updating products with our sophisticated XML feeds.

UKDropshipGroup.com Review also provides you with a full collection of business tools to get you up and running, including marketing packages, business telephone numbers, and much more â€“ all Free of charge.

The dropshipping suppliers, and dropshippers we introduce you to, are tried-and-tested suppliers who are the perfect compliment to running your own business, and we also provide FREE Dropship accounts, which can also save you a decent amount of start-up revenue.

Our product ranges include:

Beauty Dropshipping
Lingerie Products
Computer Products and components
DVDs, Niche and popular
Wedding Dropshipping
Football and Sports
AdultProducts for Dropshipping
Gadget and Gizmo Dropshipping
Inkjet and Cartridges.

With many more ranges in the pipeline, which will be offered as and when, to our clients.

When your business is up and running, you also gain the full back up of a customer service team, as well as a techincal team, who can help you every step of the way, to ensure that your new business gets off to the best possible start.

For full details, please visit our website, and choose a product range that best suits your interests, and you can then look foward to seeing your new website business online, inside 30 minutes.

We look forward to working with you, and we hope this UKDropshipGroup.com Review has helped.
